item.title: Hacking Gigs Manifesto
item.description:
The framework is simple: 

5 people + 2 guests  
30 hours  
1 project

Stuff we like: 

SW + HW  
Design  
Arts

How do we choose what to make? 

"3 things I wanna learn"
30 min brainstorming  
best idea: go!

And after that? 

pepperoni w/ cheddar, anyone?  
project video + blog post  
when do
item.dc:creator: Lui Pillmann
item.content:encoded:
The framework is simple: 

5 people + 2 guests  
30 hours  
1 project

Stuff we like: 

SW + HW  
Design  
Arts

How do we choose what to make? 

"3 things I wanna learn"
30 min brainstorming  
best idea: go!

And after that? 

pepperoni w/ cheddar, anyone?  
project video + blog post  
when do we meet again?
